text:
Behind-the-scenes Hicks has played a big role in the coronavirus response: Sitting in on task force meetings, overseeing Trump's schedule, and bringing CEOs to WH.

She's the rare aide who can give Trump candid advice in a crisis: https://t.co/xKxnHQjukX
